definition: Beichuan Qiang autonomous county in Mianyang 綿陽|绵阳[Mian2 yang2], north Sichuan
north/(classical) to be defeated
abbr. for Sichuan Province 四川[Si4 chuan1] in southwest China
river/creek/plain/an area of level country
county

sentences.english: Strange BedfellowsSurvivors carry salvaged mattresses near earthquake-ravaged Beichuan County in China's Sichuan province.
sentences.chinese: 地震的幸存者扛着救灾床垫走在北川县城外。

sentences.english: The quake-hit county will be preserved and serve as a base for earthquake education in the future.
sentences.chinese: 现北川县城可能保留现状，作为地震教育基地。

sentences.english: Prior to this, Kitagawa has been the county seat around the barbed wire fence.
sentences.chinese: 在此之前，一直是北川县城周围的铁丝网。

sentences.english: Survivors carry salvaged mattresses near earthquake-ravaged Beichuan County in China's Sichuan province.
sentences.chinese: 地震的幸存者扛着救灾床垫走在北川县城外。

sentences.english: The aim of the army is the Tangjiashan quake lake located at the upper reaches of the Beichuan County.
sentences.chinese: 部队的目标，是位于北川县城上游的唐家山堰塞湖。

sentences.english: In Bei Chuan County , emergency communications vehicles are still used to maintain communication with the outside.
sentences.chinese: 北川县仍利用应急通信车继续保持对外通信联络。

sentences.english: In Beichuan county, the traffic department has temporarily closed roads.
sentences.chinese: 在北川县，交通部门已暂时封闭道路。

sentences.english: Two thirds of the Qiang ethnic population in Beichuan died in the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 北川县三分之二的姜族居民在地震中丧生。
